VideoPara: Your idea, your project— Every quote you get is different. So, what’s the real number? The reality? A staggering 70% of projects suffer from scope creep, while only 30% are delivered on time, within budget. Gain clarity with our Estimation Package—before you commit.

You’ve got estimates and quotes—but who’s the right fit? With countless agencies and developers offering different stacks, it’s overwhelming. Who has real skills, not just a great pitch? Our Screening Package cuts through the noise, helping you choose with confidence.
